responsibilities: Analyze the needs in terms of transformation and data flow.
Design and build robust and modular data transformation routines.
Participate in the development of test cases as well as in their realization.
Produce technical design documents as well as production guides.
Align processes with the norms and standards in place in the organization as well as with best practices.
Develop processing by providing new functionalities.
Ensure the transfer of expertise to the different teams.
qualifications: Very good knowledge of SQL databases.
Hands-on experience building and operating scalable and secure systems on AWS / Google cloud / Azure or similar.
Good communication skills and a sense of teamwork.
Autonomy, organization, and ability to prioritize.
Result orientation and concern for customer satisfaction.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on data transformation, designing and building data routines, developing test cases, producing technical documents, aligning processes with organizational standards, and developing new functionalities. The skills required include knowledge of SQL databases, experience with cloud platforms, analytical and problem-solving skills, communication, teamwork, autonomy, organization, and customer satisfaction.

There is no mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is primarily on data transformation, cloud systems, and technical documentation, which are not directly related to GenAI or LLMs. Therefore, it is unlikely that this job involves working with Generative AI or language models.
